basics.name: Not provided
basics.label: Registered Nurse
basics.summary: Professional nurse dedicated to improving the wellbeing of the patients served. Has a focus on managing illness with skill, compassion, the provision of a safe and therapeutic environment, and promoting respect and positive communication among all healthcare teams.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Applied nursing knowledge and skills within relationship based care, using nursing processes to meet the clinical, spiritual, psychological needs of patients and families. Held multiple responsibilities such as teaching to patients, precepting new staff, responsible for Hemovac Autotransfusion System administration, etc.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided health care assistance at home including tasks like reading and recording temperature, completing and submitting clinical documentation, assisting with fluid intake, etc.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided direct patient care as directed by RN and helping to maintain a safe environment conducive to the recovery and safety of each patient in the unit. Provided supervision and companionship to patients as required.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Attended to emergency and non-emergency medical requests, performing and/or assisting in the initial assessment and management of illness or injury to emergency patients.

skills.name: Nursing Skills
keywords: Use of hemovacs, autotransfusion devices, continuous passive motion therapy, traction, orthopedic braces
